Barista.name: Barista
Barista.journal: A usually calm doggo that runs the ask cafe.
magquote: You won't be getting out of this encounter alive.
dodgequote: God damn why are you so cocky??
killquote: Maybe now you'll think twice about challenging me.
Think about what you did wrong when you aproached me.

Miniscle.journal: Attacks in groups, persuing those they feel are dangerous to them. Most use the sharpness of their icicles to determine who should lead. They are known to have a very cold personality, and don't usually enjoy making friends with other species.

negotiate.name: Pet
require: %PLAYER% pets the Miniscle. It's very happy.
%PLAYER% pets the Miniscle, but it doesn't budge.

negotiate.name: Compliment
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% compliments the Miniscle on their rounded spikes. Miniscle seems overjoyed.

negotiate.name: Ignore
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% ignores the Miniscle. Miniscle seems desperate for attention.

Miniscle.name: Miniscle

Moltescle.journal: Attacks in groups, fleeing if they are wounded.
Moltescle.name: Moltescle

Murk.journal: Past lives are imprinted on this world in one way or another. Methods of fighting are often those of lives past, and the number they attack in are affected by that aswell. These are often extremely strong, so fighting these is for those who are willing to take on the challenge.
Murk.name: Murk

Shimite.journal: Attacks in large groups. They always have backup if they're in danger. It feeds on crystals to get stronger.
Shimite.name: Shimite

Glimbat.journal: Attacks alone, but will freely accept help from it's allies.
Glimbat.name: Glimbat

Sacriful.journal: A sacrificial monster that will happilly give it's life to protect others, friend or foe.
Sacriful.name: Sacriful

GlowingCrystal.journal: Often in solutude, this monster creeps around the Crystal Mountain, hunting for prey. Usually this is Shimite but not always.
GlowingCrystal.name: GlowingCrystal

Mosstone.journal: A mossy rock creature, reanimated by a force that used to be deep within the forest. It has no wills, no goals, it just hunts prey.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% pets the Mosstone! It's seems... like it enjoys it?

Mosstone.name: Mosstone

Spiritual.journal: Spirit said to be from hell. It's an imprint of past life, however, it has some unfinished buisness to attend to.

negotiate.name: Calm
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to calm the Spiritual. It seems calmer.

Spiritual.name: Spiritual

Croconite.journal: Crocodile that enjoys gnawing on things. They often mistake their friends as wood, and bite them.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% reluctantly pets the Croconite.

negotiate.name: Stick
negotiate.desc: Throw a stick at the Croconite to play fetch.
negotiate.action: Croconite enjoys %PLAYER%'s game of fetch.

Croconite.name: Croconite

Toxiplant.journal: Rare plant that poisons it's foes quite easilly. Endangered due to the lack of food.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% reluctantly pets the Toxiplant.

negotiate.name: Wiggle
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% mimics the wiggling patterns of the Toxiplant. Toxiplant enjoys this.

Toxiplant.name: Toxiplant

Noxiherb.journal: Rare plant that poisons it's foes quite easilly. Endangered due to the lack of food.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% reluctantly pets the Noxiherb.

negotiate.name: Wiggle
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% mimics the wiggling patterns of the Noxiherb. Noxiherb enjoys this.

Noxiherb.name: Noxiherb

Grassimp.journal: Defenseless bug that hides under bushes. They warm up to other people very quickly, and never intend to hurt others. They love being held & pet, and nuzzle others to show their trust. During the summers, they bloom & hand out the blueberries produced to friends & trusted allies.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% pets the Grassimp! It's satisfied.

Grassimp.name: Grassimp

Mossimp.journal: A bunch of Grassimps piled together. They're found primarily in swamps, they huddle together for warmth and safety.

negotiate.name: Soothe
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% soothes the Mossimp by talking to it calmly.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: There's just too many Grassimps for %PLAYER% to pet! They apreciate the effort though.

Mossimp.name: Mossimp

GreatMossimp.journal: A bunch of Grassimps piled together. They're found primarily in swamps, they huddle together for warmth and safety.
GreatMossimp.name: GreatMossimp

MassiveMossimp.journal: A bunch of Grassimps piled together. They're found primarily in swamps, they huddle together for warmth and safety.
MassiveMossimp.name: MassiveMossimp

Grassage.journal: Magical Grassimp that fights for the safety of others of it's kind. It can be dangerous when encountered in groups. It, like a regular Grassimp, loves pets, and will warm up to others easilly.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% pets the Grassage! It seems to trust you more.

Grassage.name: Grassage

Mosscreep.journal: A Mossstone that tries to disguise itself as a Grassimp to get away from trouble. It even teaches itself basic Grassimp Moves to fare in the wild.
Mosscreep.name: Mosscreep

Reactite.journal: Small bug-like creature reanimated by the force of something within the forest. It runs away from anything that harms it.
Reactite.name: Reactite

Mossknight.journal: A mossy creature, reanimated by the force of something within the forest. A skilled knight with the ability to pierce through anything it sees fit. Supposedly guarding that 'something'.
Mossknight.name: Mossknight

Folly.journal:
A foolish ghost manifested by infection. 
It flies towards it's prey, and attacks with hard hitting strikes.
Folly.name: Folly

Enigstone.journal: An animate stone, usually mild in nature. Usually found on mountains.
Enigstone.name: Enigstone

negotiate.name: Joke
negotiate.desc: Tell a joke or pun to Enigstone.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to think of a pun, and tells Enigstone. It's a bad joke lmfao

negotiate.name: Throw
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% lifts up the Enigstone, but it's seems angered.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% pets Enigstone, and it is pleased.

Mystone.journal: An animate stone, usually mild in nature. Usually found on mountains.
Mystone.name: Mystone

negotiate.name: Rub
negotiate.desc: Rub it's crystals to make them squeaky clean.
negotiate.action: Mystone seems progressively happier with %PLAYER%'s assistance.

negotiate.name: Push
negotiate.desc: Push Mystone out of the way.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to push Mystone out of the way, but Mystone just seems angry now.

Nymbulous.journal: An animate cloud, very agressive in nature. They like to mimic clouds, and strike their foes with lightning from the sky.
Nymbulous.name: Nymbulous

Sandmound.journal: Small living specks of sand come together to create this small monster. It roams the Avocado Desert, seeking safety.
Sandmound.name: Sandmound

Sandifly.journal: Small living specks of sand come together to create this small monster. It flies around the Avocado Desert, seeking safety.
Sandifly.name: Sandifly

Memoiru.journal: An infected creature that goes around, mimicking people that it's targets know, and luring them to their lair, to be killed and sometimes consumed.
Memoiru.name: Memoiru

Monia.journal: Thought to be closely related to the diety Monum.
Monia.name: Monia

Monum.journal: An unknown diety. One of the four that were tasked with the task of guarding the being chosen to protect this world from infection.
Monum.name: Monum

negotiate.name: Restore
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% pleads to Monum. Monum remembers...

AwakenedMonum.name: AwakenedMonum
AwakenedMonum.journal: A stronger, more complete form of Monum. Angered over the destruction of the lands, Monum has grown stronger, restless and enraged. It controls elements of Water, Wind and Poison, and is seen as the god of those.

negotiate.name: Calm
negotiate.desc: Try to convince the Deity into stopping it's wrath.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% pleads to Awakened Monum. It only slightly seems to be listening.

negotiate.name: Return
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% returns Awakened Monum's frustration to it. It seems pissed.

Agilitop.journal: It spins on it's head to gain speed, and then kicks it's foes with the strongest of kicks.

negotiate.name: Spin
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% spins around with the Agilitop! It is happy!

negotiate.name: Joke
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tells the most basic of puns. Agilitop seems amused.

Agilitop.name: Agilitop

Topium.journal: A larger, more furry Agilitop. It roams the plains, making sure the Agilitops that inhabit them are safe, and will only come out if in danger.
Topium.name: Topium

Flarebubble.journal: Attacks in groups, fleeing if they are wounded.
Flarebubble.name: Flarebubble

Ghasty.journal: A scared ghost that will attack only when confronted or terrified for it's safety.
Ghasty.name: Ghasty

Nyamo.journal: Thought to be closely related to the diety Nyamem. Little dragon babies that love to play around.

negotiate.name: Roar
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% imitates the Nyamo's roars. Nyamo is satisfied.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% pets the Nyamo. It feels somewhat happy.

negotiate.name: Playtime
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% plays with Nyamo. It is satisfied

Nyamo.name: Nyamo

Nyamush.journal: Thought to be closely related to the diety Nyamem. A water dragon that isn't afraid to fight. They're generally very friendly unless provoked and hang out near ponds.

negotiate.name: Roar
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% imitates the Nyamush's roars. Nyamush is satisfied.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% pets the Nyamush. It feels somewhat happy.

negotiate.name: Snarl
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% snarles at the Nyamush, and it feels challenged! It returns the agressive behavior to %PLAYER%.

Nyamush.name: Nyamush

ViolentNyamo.journal: Thought to be closely related to the diety Nyamem, though now infected.
ViolentNyamo.name: ViolentNyamo

ViolentNyamush.journal: Thought to be closely related to the diety Nyamem, though now infected.
ViolentNyamush.name: ViolentNyamush

NyamoWarrior.journal: Thought to be closely related to the diety Nyamem. They fight together to guard their mother, said to be Nyamem themselves.
NyamoWarrior.name: NyamoWarrior

VolatileWarrior.journal: Thought to be closely related to the diety Nyamem. They fight together to guard their mother, said to be Nyamem themselves. As it is infected, it cannot do it's job as well.
VolatileWarrior.name: VolatileWarrior

Hydruu.journal: Thought to be closely related to the diety Nyamem. This larger Nyamush has 3 heads, and roams the lands ensuring all Nyamo, Nyamush, Nyamo Warrior and even Nyamem herself are living peacefully.
Hydruu.name: Hydruu

Nyamem.journal: A live creature, hiding the true diety within it. If it were to be defeated, it would calm the diety inside.

negotiate.name: Snarl
negotiate.desc: Growl at Nyamem. Enrage it, and make it lose focus.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% growls at Nyamem. It did not like that.

negotiate.name: Tip
negotiate.desc: Tip Nyamem's crown. Enrage it, and make it lose focus.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% attacks Nyamem's crown. It did not like that.

negotiate.name: Compliment.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% compliments Nyamem's crown. They feel prideful.

Nyamem.name: Nyamem

InfectedNyamem.journal: A live creature, hiding the true diety within it. It was infected, and now strikes at full power.
InfectedNyamem.name: InfectedNyamem

Evergreen.journal: A tree, hiding the true diety within it. Defeating this strong foe would calm the entity inside for a long period of time without using the Fantasy Wielder.
Evergreen.name: Evergreen

Mawler.journal: Strong creature that roams around the Crystal Mountain's deepest caves. This creature is so scary, that no other dares even live nearby. It's sorta like a uninteneded guardian for the rock diety.
Mawler.name: Mawler

GravenIdol.journal: The diety of rock and earth. They're huge, and have the power to start powerful earthquakes with a simple stomp.
GravenIdol.name: GravenIdol

InfectedVessel.journal: An infectious vessel, rumoured to be the guardian of the source of the Infection. Now infected, it roams the lands, leaving behind piles of orange goo.
InfectedVessel.name: InfectedVessel

RefinedVessel.journal: The Pure form of the Infected Vessel. If defeated, it will summon the Luminosity at her full power.
RefinedVessel.name: RefinedVessel

TheLuminosity.journal: The god of light herself. When angered, she spreads her influence with mutus, an infectious liquid that if enveloped in for too long, may take control of the victim. She has aged over time and therefore, cannot use her true power.
TheLuminosity.name: TheLuminosity

ElderLuminosity.journal: The Luminosity aged over time, and lost some of her power due to the fact that everybody stopped worshipping her. Her elder ancestor would step in if provoked. This is her at full power, while everyone still worshipped her, and gave strength. This battle will be a lengthy one. **Good luck**.
ElderLuminosity.name: ElderLuminosity

Hitten.journal: A robot with large steel fists, made for hard-hitting attacks.
Hitten.name: Hitten

Eleku.journal: An electrical robot that gathers electricity for more power.
Eleku.name: Eleku

Minet.journal: A self destructing robot used for defensive purposes.
Minet.name: Minet

Lazerite.journal: An electrical robot that attacks by firing lasers at their targets.
Lazerite.name: Lazerite

Windite.journal: A robot that is powered by wind. It strikes with strong currents.
Windite.name: Windite

Frostite.journal: A robot that is powered by the cold. It strikes with freezing mist.
Frostite.name: Frostite

Mossite.journal: A robot that is powered by the smell of nature.
Mossite.name: Mossite

Aquatite.journal: A robot that is powered by watery tides.
Aquatite.name: Aquatite

BigStriker.journal: A larger robot, stronger than the others.
BigStriker.name: BigStriker

Frostimp.journal: This Grassimp's leaves froze over, and it now uses this as a better method of defense. Unfortunately, it's a worse method of defense.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% pets the Frostimp! It feels content.

Frostimp.name: Frostimp

Verglasimp.journal: A bunch of Frostimps clumped together.

negotiate.name: Soothe
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% soothes the Verglasimp by talking to it calmly.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: There's just too many Frostimps for %PLAYER% to pet! They apreciate the effort though.

Verglasimp.name: Verglasimp

Frostsage.journal: This Frostsage's leaves froze over, and it now uses this as a better method of defense. Unfortunately, it's a worse method of defense.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% pets the Frostsage! It starts to feel convinced.

Frostsage.name: Frostsage

Icifli.journal: An icy fly. Physically unable to attack, so it assists it's allies instead.
Icifli.name: Icifli

Snowamor.journal: A huge statue made of snow. It guards the Freeing Peaks and it's surroundings.

negotiate.name: Throw Snowball
negotiate.desc: Throw a snowball at the Snowamor.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% throws a snowball at the Snowamor! It seems offended.

negotiate.name: Pun
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% makes a bad ice pun. Snowamor seems amused.

negotiate.name: Hack at Legs
negotiate.desc: Hack at the Snowamor's legs to make it less durable.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% hacks at Snowamor's legs. It seems enraged.

negotiate.name: Lullaby
negotiate.desc: Sing a lullaby to pacify it.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% sung a quick lullaby.

Snowamor.name: Snowamor

Howlice.journal: A powerful wolf-like creature with the power to destroy a rock with one strike.

negotiate.name: Snarl
negotiate.desc: Growl at the Howlice to relate to it.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% growls with Howlice. It seems happier.

Howlice.name: Howlice

Arftic.journal: A fluffy doggo that hunts for food. It loves pets.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.desc: Pet the doggo just pet the doggo
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% pets the Arftic! It's satisfied.

Arftic.name: Arftic

negotiate.name: Apologise
negotiate.desc: Apologise for disturbing the Frost Tunneler.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% apologises to the Frost Tunneler. It doesn't seem very convinced.

negotiate.name: Refrain
negotiate.desc: Refrain from attacking the Frost Tunneler.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% shows mercy. The Frost Tunneler seems to acknowledge this.

Robat.journal: A small robotic bat. It sucks on others' blood to use as energy as it is rich in oxygen (usually.)

negotiate.name: Debug
negotiate.desc: Debug and restore it's passive behavior.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% debugs the Robat and tries to restore it's behaviour.

Robat.name: Robat

Mechanium.journal: A small robotic creature that yells at it's foes to intimidate them.

negotiate.name: Yell
negotiate.desc: Yell in responce to it's yelling.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER%'s yells enrage it more!

negotiate.name: Soothe
negotiate.desc: Softly speak in responce to it's yelling.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% attempts to soothe the Mechanium.

negotiate.name: Watch
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% stares at Mechanium... yet, it feels calmed, because you're not attacking it.

Mechanium.name: Mechanium

Foxbot.journal: A strong fox-like robot that prefers to strike with their claws.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER%'s pets calm the Foxbot.

Foxbot.name: Foxbot

ReignitedFlare.journal: One of the weapons of mass destruction sealed away to protect the world from the ''The Destroyer''. This one focused on boiling hot attacks and was the most destructive.

negotiate.name: Cut
negotiate.desc: Cuts a wire and loosens it's durability.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% snaps one of Reignited Flare's wires!

ReignitedFlare.name: ReignitedFlare

RechargedSpark.journal: One of the weapons of mass destruction sealed away to protect the world from the ''The Destroyer''. This one focused on electrical attacks and usually stayed back to assist.

negotiate.name: Cut
negotiate.desc: Cuts a wire and loosens it's durability.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% snaps one of Recharged Spark's wires!

RechargedSpark.name: RechargedSpark

RefinedFrost.journal: One of the weapons of mass destruction sealed away to protect the world from the ''The Destroyer''. This one focused on ice attacks and was the stronger of the three.

negotiate.name: Convince
negotiate.desc: Convince the robot to stop attacking you.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to convince Refined Frost. There's not much of an effect.

RefinedFrost.name: RefinedFrost

Galactima.name: Galactima
Galactima.journal: A small bot with a body that looks like it's a small galaxy. Loves to be in groups of three or four when adventuring.

AcuteGenerator.name: AcuteGenerator
AcuteGenerator.journal: A generator stuck in the floor that provides power to the various machines around the facility it is present in.

ShrewdGenerator.name: ShrewdGenerator
ShrewdGenerator.journal: A generator stuck in the floor that provides power to the various machines around the facility it is present in.

SizeableBasher.name: SizeableBasher
SizeableBasher.journal: A large robot that is able to strike foes with little issue. Built for war, but because if it's design, it remained unused.

MasterSerpant.name: MasterSerpant
MasterSerpant.journal: The controller of the Refurbished Frost robot. Unlike the others that controlled their robots, he will fight alongside it and make sure it does its intended duty. ~~Haha, snek men joke here~~

negotiate.name: Discuss
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to talk to MasterSerpant. There's not much of an effect.

negotiate.name: Convince
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to talk to MasterSerpant. There's not much of an effect.

DJ.name: DJ
DJ.journal: The ultimate battle against the world's Reaper is just a step ahead. Challenge him if you dare.

DJ_C.name: DJ_C
DJ_C.journal: The ultimate battle against the world's Reaper is just a step ahead. Challenge him if you dare.

GrassyWarrior.name: GrassyWarrior
GrassyWarrior.journal: A larger, bipedal Grassimp, holding a sword and shield. This type of Grassimp emerged quite recently due to the massive spike of Grassimp murder. They fight for the safety of their kind.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% pets the Grassy Warrior. It seems to like it... and it's slowly letting it's guard down.

negotiate.name: Engarde
negotiate.desc: Put up your weapon -- or fists.
negotiate.action: It appears Grassy Warrior sees %PLAYER%'s actions as a challenge.

GrassyGeneral.name: GrassyGeneral
GrassyGeneral.journal: A larger, bipedal Grassimp, holding a sword and shield. This type of Grassimp emerged quite recently due to the massive spike of Grassimp murder. They fight for the safety of their kind, and looks over all of the Grassy Warriors.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% pets the Grassy General. It seems slightly swayed.

negotiate.name: Fetch
negotiate.desc: Throw a stick at the Grassy General
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% throws a nearby stick next to the Grassy General. It gives the stick back to them.

negotiate.name: Engarde
negotiate.desc: Put up your weapon -- or fists.
negotiate.action: It appears Grassy General sees %PLAYER%'s actions as a challenge.

ExplosiveDice.journal: A murderous metalic dice, with the intent to explode and damage all on the battlefield. Defeat it before it explodes, or it will hurt everyone!

negotiate.name: Mitigate
negotiate.desc: Convince the Explosive Dice to stop exploding.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to mitigate the issue. The Explosive Dice decides _not_ to explode.

ExplosiveDice.name: ExplosiveDice

Psibo.journal: Small, flying creatures that love to play around. They are the main species that utilise the Psychic type.

negotiate.name: Playtime
require: %PLAYER% plays with the Psibo! It enjoys it, and is satisfied.
%PLAYER% tries to play with the Psibo, but it is not paying attention.

negotiate.name: Focus
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% focuses on the Psibo. It seems unnerved.

negotiate.name: Call
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% whistles to catch Psibo's attention.

Psibo.name: Psibo

Psiobo.journal: Small, agile creature with a cool-looking trident.

negotiate.name: Playtime
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% plays with Psiobo. It enjoyed that, a little.

negotiate.name: Focus
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% focuses on the Psiobo. It's unaffected.

negotiate.name: Prank
negotiate.desc: Play a prank on the Psiobo
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% takes Psiobo's trident without it knowing. It laughs, and snatches it's trident back.

Psiobo.name: Psiobo

Psiodynebo.journal: Large, Agile creature with a strong trident.

negotiate.name: Compliment
negotiate.desc: Find something to compliment about the Psiodynebo.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% finds one of Psiodynebo's features to compliment. It is slightly swayed.

Psiodynebo.name: Psiodynebo

Periphe.journal: Polygonic creature shrouded in mist, litterally. It roams the Torrential Tower in attempts to scare others away from what lies at the top.

negotiate.name: Solve
negotiate.desc: Figure something out about the Periphe.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to debug the Periphe to let it go, but it presents you with a mathematical equation.

Periphe.name: Periphe

Chesty.journal: A mindless chest-like being that mimics chests to lure in foes.

negotiate.name: Toss
negotiate.desc: Toss something into the Chesty's mouth.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tosses a stick into the Chesty's mouth. It seems happy.

Chesty.name: Chesty

TheDestroyer.name: TheDestroyer
TheDestroyer.journal: The first form of what those hundreds of years ago feared. Awoken by the 3 cores of those robots, they will strike down the first things they see.

DestructiveTitan.name: DestructiveTitan
DestructiveTitan.journal: The final form of what those hundreds of years ago feared. It exists to combat The Luminosity.

Patella(Enemy).name: Patella(Enemy)
Patella(Enemy).journal: 'Representation of Death', but it's just a thought of his. A necromancer, capable of cheating death. No fear, shown from murdering people.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% managed to pet %ENEMY%. They are satisfied.

RagedNyamem.name: RagedNyamem
RagedNyamem.journal: The once calm Nyamem, now fueled by a primal and destructive rage because of the destruction of the nature of Yaretza. Be aware that she isn't going to go easy against anyone that tries to take her down, peacefully or destructively, without a long fight.

negotiate.name: Calm
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tried to calm the dragon, and it wasn't much progress

Lychy.name: Lychy
Lychy.journal: Defenseless critters born from inside of caves. Very afraid of their future, they tend to run away very easily, but when trusted, will warm up and follow them around. They love being held like a baby and will nuzzle no matter what. They can give out their lychen for blessings and fortune, which grow usually at nights, but to ones Lychy trusts with their soul.

negotiate.name: Lullaby
negotiate.desc: Sing a sweet lullaby to mellow down the Lychy.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% sings a lullaby to the Lychy. They are mellowed down, satisfied.

negotiate.name: ScaryFace
negotiate.desc: Pull off a scary face to the Lychy.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% scares the Lychy with a scary face. They tremble, fearful.

LychenImp.name: LychenImp
LychenImp.journal: Despite being an evolution of a Lychy, the Lychen Imp is still a very sensitive entity, running away from intense danger. However with their newfound courage they are more likely to stick around. They are slowly learning to defend for themselves for the sake of blessings and fortune. They are still very much to give lychen to the ones the imp trusts, this time more of them.

negotiate.name: Lullaby
negotiate.desc: Sing a sweet lullaby to mellow down the Lychen Imp.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% sings a lullaby to the Lychen Imp. They mellow down, satisfied.

negotiate.name: ScaryFace
negotiate.desc: Pull off a scary face to the Lychen Imp.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% scares the Lychen Imp with a scary face. They tremble, feared.

negotiate.name: ScaryFace
negotiate.desc: Pull off a scary face to the Lychen Imp.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% scares the Lychen Imp with a scary face. They tremble, fearful.

LychenAngel.name: LychenAngel
LychenAngel.journal: Evolved from the Lychen Imp, they would resemble a true guardian of fellow Grass Imp species. An angel of glory, hope and bless, seen as perfect and purified. Still very friendly towards people, but now will attack very much if the attacked had done a sin throughout their life time within the means of purification and acceptance in the eyes of higher ones. Lychen are now used on a regular basis for them for the sole reason, since they can grow a lot more now, and more often.

negotiate.name: Lullaby
negotiate.desc: Sing a sweet lullaby to mellow down the Lychen Angel.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% sings a lullaby to the Lychen Angel. They mellow down, satisfied.

negotiate.name: Confess
negotiate.desc: Confess your sins to the Lychen Angel.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% confesses their sins to the Lychen Angel. They understand, blessing %PLAYER%.

Terrly(Enemy).name: Terrly(Enemy)
Terrly(Enemy).journal: A crystal guardian trying to do the best job of protecting the area they are in. However they can assume things too much, from age, and mistrust possibly. Will always show loyalty when needed.

negotiate.name: Explain
negotiate.desc: Try to explain why are you here and what happened.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to explain what happened for them to be here. Terrly understands a little bit.

negotiate.name: Intimidate
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to intimidate Terrly. They don't like this at all.

Disguaisa.name: Disguaisa
Disguaisa.journal: With the Memoiru's sudden disappearance, the Disguaisa quickly took over its territory within the caves, using optical and visual tactics to cause their pray's demise.

negotiate.name: Comfort
negotiate.desc: Try to comfort the creature of  disguises
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% would try to speak to the creature in a means to calm it down. It seems to have slowly understand what you mean.

negotiate.name: Threaten
negotiate.desc: Speak to the disguises in a rough manner
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% said harsh thing to the creature. Disguaisa visibly didn't like that action.

negotiate.name: Soothe
negotiate.desc: Sing a small tune to calm the multi-personality creature
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% sung a quaint melody to Disguaisa, who clearly enjoyed it.

PoisonMonia.name: PoisonMonia
PoisonMonia.journal: One of the few entities that are of close relation to Monum, but powered up from the primal rage from her. These small jellyfish will sting those close to them with harmful shocks and poison.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tried to pet the jellyfish, it didn't like it at all.

negotiate.name: Talk
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% talked to Monia, and despite not speaking, it enjoyed the words

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.journal: A morphing gooey creature able to copy it's foes to decieve them.

negotiate.name: Mimic
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% mimics the Mimicry's actions.

ToxidMorian.name: ToxidMorian
ToxidMorian.journal: A creature that was known to be closely related to the deity, Monum. Along with many other creatures around the deity's rage, it too was powered up from its original state. Unlike its smaller members, this one likes to get close to their opponents and hit them.

negotiate.name: Threaten
negotiate.desc: Shout at the Morian to move.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% yelled at the Morian to move, but the Morian only grew angrier.

negotiate.name: Flex
negotiate.desc: Flex your muscles with the jellyfish
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% flexed their muscles to Morian, and it would flex back with a happy motion

Crosar.name: Crosar
Crosar.journal: A shadow of a fallen warrior of times lost to the present. Despite being of ancient looks, they are just as deadly as modern creations now. While they're not fighting, some say they would contemplate the choice of moving into the afterlife, or a new life.

negotiate.name: Console
negotiate.desc: Try to console the deceased warrior
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% told the Crosar to not worry about the past, it looks like it is slowly coming back

negotiate.name: Pray
negotiate.desc: Pray for the Crosar's well being
negotiate.action: While %PLAYER% prayed for Crosar, it felt remorseful for its actions.

negotiate.name: Remind
negotiate.desc: Remind the spirit of its past
negotiate.action: Before %PLAYER% could even finish, the Crosar grew angrier with the slight mention of its past.

negotiate.name: Convince
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to convice dawn that they're safe.

negotiate.name: Aggression
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% agressively tries to convice Dawn, which backfires.

Squeleaf.name: Squeleaf
Squeleaf.journal: A cyclical jelly-like plant that wiggles with the wind. Despite it's static behaviour, it has been known for countless poison related deaths, and has been known to nibble on the heads of those who get close.

negotiate.name: Wiggle
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% copies the Squeleaf's wiggling motions. Squeleaf seems amused.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: As %PLAYER% aproaches the Squeleaf with their hand extended, Squeleaf tries to bite it!

CaveCrawler.name: CaveCrawler
CaveCrawler.journal: Small spider that penetrates various walls of caves to ambush foes and traverse said caves.

negotiate.name: Click
negotiate.desc: Catch the attention of Cave Crawler by snapping your fingers.
negotiate.action: Cave Crawler seems mesmerised by %PLAYER%'s clicks.

negotiate.name: Tap-Dance
negotiate.desc: Catch the attention of Cave Crawler by tap dancing.
negotiate.action: Cave Crawler seems mesmerised by %PLAYER%'s tap dance.

negotiate.name: Whistle
require: %PLAYER% whistles, but it's too angry to listen.

negotiate.name: Screech
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% screeches at the Cave Crawler, and now it's pissed.

Granibug.name: Granibug
Granibug.journal: Some have said that this creature is the evolved sandy flies of the Avacado Desert, but unlike their past self, they have been seen in many caves throughout the lands. They can see their prey even through the pitch dark and blinding sandstorms.

negotiate.name: Compliment
negotiate.desc: Say a nice thing to the bug
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% commented how Granibug was looking sturdy today, and it seemed to be happy about it.

negotiate.name: Ignore
negotiate.action: Despite its best intentions, %PLAYER% ignored Granibug, upsetting it.

Crystapile.name: Crystapile
Crystapile.journal: The Sandmounds of Yaretza evolved to have all sorts of crystalline-like objects to grow upon them. These enemies tend to more help their allies, but they'll use magic if needed.

negotiate.name: Shine
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% cleaned the crystals with something clean, and Crystapile was greatful.

negotiate.name: Sand
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% attempted to clean with sand, but the Crystapile disapproved of it.

Mystus.name: Mystus
Mystus.journal: A spherical being shielded by the mist it produces. Inhaling the mist has been known to produce possibly fatal side effects.

Mushi.name: Mushi
Mushi.journal: Jolly mushrooms with a playful attitude. They glow on touch and have been known to assist in lighting dark rooms. They will offer Glow Shrooms to those they like, and love being pet. While they are technically two creatures, they share one mind.

negotiate.name: Bounce
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% bounces in mimicking way. Mushi continues bouncing, happi

negotiate.name: ScaryFace
negotiate.desc: Make a scary face to the Mushi
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% makes a scary face, and Mushi is scared.

negotiate.name: Wiggle
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% wiggles in the way Mushi does, Mushi seems happy.

AngryNyamo.name: AngryNyamo
AngryNyamo.journal: The once peaceful and playful Nyamos are now lost into the primal rage of Nyamem's. They are now much more aggressive than they were before, and they pack quite a punch.

negotiate.name: Peace
negotiate.desc: Try to get the Nyamo to stay calm
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tried to assure Nyamo that they're going to be fine, and it seemed to listened.

negotiate.name: Play
negotiate.desc: Try to play with the Nyamo
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tried to play with Nyamo, but it ignored them.

HostileNyamush.name: HostileNyamush
HostileNyamush.journal: The Nyamush, despite the separation between Windrush and Wateriz, is still related to Nyamem. This dragon is now deeply angred, fueled mainly from Nyamem's awakened primal rage. They use their water to harm and prevent others from harming the others.

negotiate.name: Calm
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% sings a soft melody to calm Nyamush down, it's making progress.

negotiate.name: Roar
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% roared at the Nyamush, which they took as a sign of hostility.

negotiate.name: Approach
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% would try to approach Nyamush, but it didn't work

Moshroom.name: Moshroom
Moshroom.journal: A powerful grassy creature with mushrooms growing on it's back. It uses tusks to strike it's foes, but only when it needs to. It usually only attacks when awakened from slumber.

negotiate.name: ThrowMoss
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tosses moss at the Moshroom, and now it's eating it.

negotiate.name: Aproach
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to aproach the Moshroom, but it sees this as a challenge.

negotiate.name: Compliment
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% convinces the Moshroom not to attack by complimenting it.

Guardmos.name: Guardmos
Guardmos.journal: The fabled clad of elite Nyamos with the strength and ability to walk upon two legs. These are known to actually help out both Hydruu and Nyamem to keep the peace among the Nyamos.

Runeite.name: Runeite
Runeite.journal: Rocky bugs that often remain in buildings, or rocky areas.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% pets the Runeite, it seems happy.

negotiate.name: ScaryFace
negotiate.desc: Make a scary face to the Runeite
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% scares te Runeite, and it seems scared.

AncientHusk.name: AncientHusk
AncientHusk.journal: An ancient husk, reanimated by a ghostly being. Without feeling, it cannot be negotiated with, to calm it briefly, you must defeat it in battle.

Glimmer.name: Glimmer
Glimmer.journal: Leads groups of small Shimites in battle. They strike hard with their crystal body, easilly causing their foes to bleed.

negotiate.name: Agression
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% attempted to rub Glimmer's crystals with agility, But they just got worse.

negotiate.name: Rub
negotiate.desc: Rub up the crystals with something clean.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% cleaned the crystals with something clean, and Glimmer was greatful.

negotiate.name: Hands-On
negotiate.desc: Use your hands to rub Glimmer's crystals
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% attempted to rub Glimmer's crystals with their hands, But they just got worse.

Spinitop.name: Spinitop
Spinitop.journal: These enemies are related to the Agilitops, but they're the ones to have actually decided to stay in the region. Uses its body and legs to harm intruders. It was never affected by the rage of the Nyamem.

Gleambite.name: Gleambite
Gleambite.journal: Attracted to blood, Gleambite works in unison with lesser Glimbats to consume the blood of those who disturb it.

negotiate.name: Agression
require: %PLAYER% attempted to rub Gleambite's crystals with agility, But they just got worse.
%PLAYER% attempted to rub Gleambite's crystals, but it was too high up. **Maybe try to lure them down?**

negotiate.name: Rub
negotiate.desc: Rub up the crystals with something clean.
require: %PLAYER% cleaned the crystals with something clean, and Gleambite was greatful.
%PLAYER% attempted to rub Gleambite's crystals, but it was too high up. **Maybe try to lure them down?**

negotiate.name: Hands-On
negotiate.desc: Use your hands to rub Gleambite's crystals
require: %PLAYER% attempted to rub Gleambite's crystals with their hands, But they just got worse.
%PLAYER% attempted to rub Gleambite's crystals, but it was too high up. **Maybe try to lure them down?**

negotiate.name: Whistle
negotiate.desc: Catch the Gleambite's attention to lower it down.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% whistles to catch Gleambite's attention.

Darklin.name: Darklin
Darklin.journal: A once nice grassimp in the swamp, quickly corrupted and distorted from the bigger amounts of diseased lands from the Soul Trapper. Instead of being grassy, these creatures have a more dark body with crimson red eyes to show that it had fallen into a bad state.

negotiate.name: Purify
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% would say a prayer to purify the Darklin, it seemed to work somewhat

negotiate.name: Stare
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% stared at the Darklin, which it grew angrier from it.

Morb.name: Morb
Morb.journal: Warrior Dream summoned only by usage of the Fantasy Wielder. Desired to ascend.

negotiate.name: Purify
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% prays to Morb.

TrailingDevout.name: TrailingDevout
TrailingDevout.journal: Huge Spiders that strike after stalking the target for a while.

negotiate.name: Scare
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to scare the Trailing Devout away. It seems ammused.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to pet the Trailing Devout, but it grows enraged.

Pyradus.name: Pyradus
Pyradus.journal: Large pyramid-like structures that often guard something precious, dangerous or significant

negotiate.name: Silence
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% stays quiet, which convinces the Pyradus.

negotiate.name: Shout
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% screams at Pyradus, which enrages it!

Hydrog.name: Hydrog
Hydrog.journal: An aquatic amphibian, lurking in area with the precense of water.

negotiate.name: Hop
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% copies the Squeleaf's hopping patterns. Hydrog seems amused.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: Hydrog lets %PLAYER% pet it.

Shalines.name: Shalines
Shalines.journal: An envolved form of the Darklins that have embraced the corruption around them that are willing to fight off any intruders to allow the corruption to grow.

DJ_T.name: DJ_T
DJ_T.journal: Just your average Training Dummy, but in the form of the reaper.

DJ_T1.name: DJ_T1
DJ_T1.journal: The Reaper Training Dummy, but more durable

Grifflare.name: Grifflare
Grifflare.journal: Related to the entity living below, from Scorch Excavation. A griffin made of pure hatred in a similar fashion to the one it relates to. Impossible to pacify, vicious.

Westone.name: Westone
Westone.journal: Sentient Stone surrounded with liquid, willing to beat up anyone they dare to see with fists made of the same liquid.

negotiate.name: Kick
negotiate.desc: Kick the stone inside of a Westone
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% kicked the Westone. They are not satisfied, as the liquid got their rock again.

negotiate.name: Calm
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% calmed down the Westone. They are satisfied with that.

FlowSprout.name: FlowSprout
FlowSprout.journal: A seemingly lifeless sprout of life. It looks like a plant, but liquid circles around it like a drill. Accepts everything what gets thrown at it.

negotiate.name: Accept
negotiate.desc: Accept the reality of your situation.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% seemingly accepts the situation they are in. The Flow Sprout understands and respects that way of thinking.

negotiate.name: Pull
negotiate.desc: Try to pull out the Flow Sprout by force.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to pull out the Flow Sprout. They did not like that one bit.

Dreamie.name: Dreamie
Dreamie.journal: A ghostly entity guarding the finest of Dolense Fruit. It uses the foe's sins to strike them harder.

negotiate.name: Prove
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% proves themselves clean and pure. Dreamie seems to be judging them.

negotiate.name: Sin
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% is mean to Dreamie.

Ecossnor.name: Ecossnor
Ecossnor.journal:
[WRATH]
The one that represents pure hatred and uncontrollable violence. Will do absolutely nothing to hit you at all times, and punish you for what you have done. The only way to calm them down is not by repenting, but by stepping yourself down to them.

negotiate.name: Enrage
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% talks down to the Ecossnor, enraging them in the process. In reality this is what it wants.

negotiate.name: Enrage
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% insults Ecossnor, calling them names and such. Ecossnor appreciates the effort.

negotiate.name: PeacefulConversation
negotiate.desc: Make a peaceful conversation with the Ecossnor
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% talks to Ecossnor about any topic they want. Sports, magic, whatever. Ecossnor is absolutely not interested in that junk.

negotiate.name: Repent
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% repents Ecossnor, hoping they would disappear soon. They absolutely are not a fan of that.

Dearmyda.name: Dearmyda
Dearmyda.journal:
[SLOTH]
The one that represents the feeling of a constant daydream and lack of effort. Ironically enough, it still wants to get a hit at you but there might not be enough effort for that to happen. The only way to calm them down is not by repenting, but by stepping yourself down to them.

negotiate.name: Lullaby
negotiate.desc: Sing a lullaby for the Dearmyda
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% sings a lullaby to Dearmyda, one that might for sure put them to sleep. However they think they are doing this at the wrong targets.

negotiate.name: Nap
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% puts himself to sleep, or at least a nap. They accept it with pleasure.

negotiate.name: Laziness
negotiate.desc: Convince the Dearmyda that you don't want to attack for the reason of being lazy.
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% explains to Dearmyda how they are too lazy to attack Dearmyda. It fell for it, enjoying itself a little bit.

negotiate.name: Repent
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% repents Dearmyda, hoping they would disappear soon. They absolutely are not a fan of that.

Algittoseci.name: Algittoseci
Algittoseci.journal:
[PRIDE]
The one that represents the feeling of self-indulgence, egotistical behavior and a need to pride themselves in their achievements on repeat. It will take an effort to make their move but for the reason of needing to show their best. The only way to calm them down is not by repenting, but by stepping yourself down to them.

negotiate.name: Boogie
negotiate.desc: Give the Algittoseci a boogie time
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% gives Algittoseci a boogie time. They give the time back to them, excited.

negotiate.name: Proudness
negotiate.desc: Give your own achievements to Algittoseci
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% talks about their own achievements, what they had done, etc. Algittoseci doubles down saying they are still better than them, hurting %PLAYER%'s emotions, and this is what they truly wanted.

negotiate.name: Challenge
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% suggests Algittoseci a challenge. They won't double down on it.

negotiate.name: RealityCheck
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to get Algittoseci back on track into reality. They are not amused and decide to ignore them.

negotiate.name: Repent
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% repents Algittoseci, hoping they would disappear soon. They absolutely are not a fan of that.

Prutisotte.name: Prutisotte
Prutisotte.journal:
[LUST]
The one that represents endless sexual craving in a desire of lust and intense orgasms, but also the feeling of false love for anything anyone would imagine. It doesn't necessarily attack as much as others but it will make sure you are by their side. The only way to calm them down is not by repenting, but by stepping yourself down to them.

negotiate.name: Compliment
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% compliments Prutisotte's look, albeit a bit embarrassed or ashamed. Or maybe none of that. Prutisotte like the good start of something great.

negotiate.name: Kiss
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% decides that it was a good time and kisses one of Prutisotte's tongues, albeit either with shame or thrilled excitement. They love this a lot.

negotiate.name: DoubleDown
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% doubles down to Prutisotte, deciding on a date to attend to, even if it's not gonna happen. Prutisotte loves that idea.

negotiate.name: Reject
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% seems that they don't like Prutisotte's attitude, rejecting them. They become extremely saddened afterwards.

negotiate.name: Repent
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% repents Prutisotte, hoping they would disappear soon. They absolutely are not a fan of that.

Lariamestim.name: Lariamestim
Lariamestim.journal:
[GREED]
The one that represents materialism and a need for gathering riches, along with the egoistical attachment to them purely due to a very specific monetary value. They don't seemingly care about people as much as others expect. The only way to calm them down is not by repenting, but by stepping yourself down to them.

negotiate.name: Give
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% gives some of their riches to Lariamestim. They appreciate the gesture.

negotiate.name: Steal
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% steals part of a necklace from Lariamestim, and you managed to anger them because of it.

negotiate.name: Insult
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% convinces himself to have the audacity, to call Lariamestim poor. They actually insult you instead.

negotiate.name: Repent
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% repents Lariamestim, hoping they would disappear soon. They absolutely are not a fan of that.

Soytebi.name: Soytebi
Soytebi.journal:
[GLUTTONY]
The one that represents endless hunger and infinitude in terms of indulging themselves in overeating whatever they see on their path. They don't insist on making their target to be defeated. None of that. Instead on top of they, they desire eating everything they see, like a ground worm of eldritch nightmares. The only way to calm them down is not by repenting, but by stepping yourself down to them.

negotiate.name: BodyShame
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% decides to body shame Soytebi for their choices. They absolutely did not appreciate that thought.

negotiate.name: Engage
negotiate.desc: Engage the Soytebi with a challenge
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% challenged Soytebi into an eating competition. The Soytebi, knowing they'll win accept with pleasure.

negotiate.name: Attempt
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% starts trying to eat their partner in battle, in hopes of getting on the side of Soytebi, but give up quick. You can feel Soy's amusement.

negotiate.name: Repent
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% repents Soytebi, hoping they would disappear soon. They absolutely are not a fan of that.

negotiate.name: Consult
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to consult Soytebi in trying to get them in a better diet... Which ends on failure.

Terponiteus.name: Terponiteus
Terponiteus.journal:
[ENVY]
The one that represents the feeling of conscienceless, resentful longing aroused from someone else's qualities, skills, possessions, or even luck. They depend on you trying to be better at them in any possible capacity. If they find something, they will rush you down to crisp. The only way to calm them down is not by repenting, but by stepping yourself down to them.

negotiate.name: Calm
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to calm down Terponiteus through normal ways. They still are envious at them.

negotiate.name: Complain
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% complains to Terponiteus about their behavior. They get the spirit, but it's not enough.

negotiate.name: Repent
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% repents Terponiteus, hoping they would disappear soon. They absolutely are not a fan of that.

Sibling.name: Sibling
Sibling.journal: A sibling of the void. Thought to be directly related to the Destructive Titan. It is only seen at lower points within the ground, or in shadowy areas. It sees anything not made of the void-like substance called Eruyami as a threat. It also sees Eruyami creatures siding with those of other kind as betrayal.

Applup.name: Applup
Applup.journal: A small bug that hides inside apples, for stealth-related reasons. It loves to roll around, and finds it funny when other people actually mistake it for an apple.

Dirtmound.name: Dirtmound
Dirtmound.journal: A large creature that hides itself in the ground. Many accidentally step on it, and so, provoke it into attacking. Usually, it lays dormant, so grass can grow on it's head, as can certain special flowers.

negotiate.name: Pet
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% pets the dirtmound on it's head. It feels slightly happy.

negotiate.name: UseDirt
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% tries to cover the Dirtmound back up, and it starts feeling drowsy.

negotiate.name: Slap
negotiate.action: %PLAYER% slaps the Dirtmound, and it feels upset.

HeartKraken.name: HeartKraken
HeartKraken.journal: A huge beast with a fiery heart. This beast is rumored to cause magma to rise when its rage is at its peak. The only solution to win is by defeating the beast.

Rainbow...?.name: Rainbow...?
Rainbow...?.journal: A somewhat familiar hedgehog(?), overrun with a weird multicoloured power. He wields an energy-based scythe and will show no mercy.

LuminousWings.name: LuminousWings
LuminousWings.journal: The true form of The Luminosity. She spreads her wings, and shines bright. In this form, she is at her strongest. This is a form she uses mostly to combat the biggest threats to her and Yaretza. It is considered eternal good luck if you ever see her in this form, as most will not or can not. She is considered a myth among most.
